snippet.title: Battlestar Galactica: Condition One | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
A new game release! This is a free, short Battlestar Galactica experience playable on screen or in VR, Explore the fleet and fight Cylons. (To be clear, most if not all of the art/models were made by other people on the internet, I just fancied them up and made a game with them.)
A surprising turn around time on this project, being that the only person developing it was me. I started working on it in May of this year.
[Before people ask, yes Bmop is still being developed, but it's obviously not my only project.]

If you encounter a bug please report it here or on the Itch page.

*DOWNLOAD*
https://jocool1231.itch.io/battlestar-galactica-condition-one
